Package me.phoenix.slimelib.slimefun.block

Class TickingMenuContainer

java.lang.Object
io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.api.items.SlimefunItem
me.phoenix.slimelib.slimefun.block.MenuContainer
me.phoenix.slimelib.slimefun.block.TickingMenuContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.core.attributes.Placeable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Generator, Machine
public abstract class TickingMenuContainer extends MenuContainer
Represents a Block that has an in-built Menu which ticks periodically.
